column5: Went from this...     To this!          Happy it's all done finally!
Looks good. Gotta love when a job like that is done
Looks great..Who did the tile work.. good job.I love those Schluter stair nosing...Im  working on a Kitchen in Hamilton right now....
Wow man great job!  Looks fantastic!

Thanks! I'm really happy with the finished product from a complete gut job lol... No more Reno's on the go here anymore for now ?  Oh and also tb4me it was the girlfriends uncle who did the tiling, him and I did all the work, and yeah I love the schluter look on those steps... Rondec is what it's called

Thanks! I'm really happy with the finished product from a complete gut job lol... No more Reno's on the go here anymore for now  Oh and also tb4me it was the girlfriends uncle who did the tiling, him and I did all the work, and yeah I love the schluter look on those steps... Rondec is what it's called Im a tile setter by trade. I have been using the full line of Schluter products for almost 15 years now. I remember having to wait for my supplier to get stuff in from Germany, now the stuff is made in Montreal.  They have singe handedly reinvented the tile industry. Now everyone else has copied their products cause they work so well.

They really do make some great stuff, I'll see if I can find a picture of it, but the girlfriends dad did a bathroom in the basement and it turned out phenomenal with the linear drain... Those are sharp
